name: Al Waasi'
description: Al Waasi' is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The All-Encompassing' or 'The Boundless'.
summary: This name reflects Allah's infinite nature, His ability to encompass all things within His knowledge, mercy, and power. It signifies that Allah's provisions and knowledge extend beyond human comprehension and limitations, offering reassurance of His omnipresence and support in the lives of His creations.
